trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Coldwater
There were no other sightings in Coldwater on or around June 30th 2008
divs: Sighting Details1. i was a a cabin in michigan and i plopped down on the couch ready to watch the yankees play the red sox...i looked sideways out a window and saw this bright flashing light in the distance.it wasnt a plane or helicopter...because during the time between the flashes,i could see nothing. i wastched it for about 10 seconds then it disapeared out of my view. 2. looking out the window i saw a flashing light. 3. i thought at first it a was a helicopter or plain but there was no body there. 4.there was no 'object',it was just a flashing light moving through the sky. i went in a straight line...i couldn't tell but it seemed very fast. 5.my feelings were...whoa...looky! a flashy light!...ya,im like that.after it left i just turned to the yanks-sox game. 6.i lost sight because it went out of my view,i was looking out a window...it also went behing a tree
